text: Arau sihamte ka’le, ‘ami yadi tomara lagata satpatha anusarana karao tente amaka desara paraa utkhata karai diya ha’ba’. Ami sihamtara babe eta niraapada haraama pratistha karaa na'i ne, ya’ta sakalo prakarara phalamula amadani haya, ami pradana karaa jiraikasbaraupa? Kintu sihamtara sarahabhaga manuhe'i e'ito najane
